task.title: How do I automatically change my status whenever I have a meeting scheduled?
task.shortdesc: If you have this feature, you can simplify your life by having your status automatically change to "In a Meeting" whenever you are in a meeting that is scheduled in your HCL Notes or Microsoft Outlook calendars.

step.cmd: Set the status to automatically display when you are in a scheduled meeting.
